website_summaries.verdict: If you like GoPro's camera design and just want solid HD video, you might be able to save yourself $100 and get this instead of the $400 Black Edition.
pros: The GoPro Hero3+ Silver Edition combines excellent HD video with recording options up to 1080p at 60fps and the same design as the company's other cameras so you have access to a large selection of accessories and mounts
cons: The $100 savings from the Black Edition costs you many shooting options and some video quality, particularly in low light
Battery life can be brief depending on the features you're using
Plan to buy accessories, including a microSD card

customer_reviews.title: GoPro's business model is fantastic. For the quality of camera
customer_reviews.text: GoPro's business model is fantastic. For the quality of camera, this price cannot be beaten. Despite my limited knowledge of photography, I can take extremely professional looking action shots and crystal clear panoramas. I have used this GoPro for snorkeling, rock climbing, kayaking, mountain biking, surfing, and hiking. I don't often shoot video because I find them laborious to watch later, so instead I take a lot of pictures in motion. They are hardly ever blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I suggest getting a different model.
customer_reviews.text: Please avoid getting the silver edition go pro, for it has some major issues. Firstly, I bought this camera brand new and it already had a username and password. It's nearly impossible to change the username and password, I even called support and they couldn't even help me. Finally after a lot of trial and error I attempted a factory reset and it bricked on me. I tried million different things, no sign of life. Currently in the process of returning this item. I did some research and found the hero 3 +silver is very well known for bricking easily. I suggest getting a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I got my refurbished GoPro after my other one stopped working. It looks brand new. The sound and video quality is perfect, and everything seems to be working great. I can't register it on GoPros site, but that doesn't really bother me so long as I can upload videos. I would definitely recommend this seller if you need a GoPro replacement quick and don't have the money to buy a new one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It won’t connect to my phone. I can’t do anything with the videos I’ve taken. This is the first time I’ve used it since I got it and it just gets really hot when I have the WiFi on and try to connect it. I should have never bought a refurbished one. 100 bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished not good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the refurbished GoPro Hero 3. I was able to get it to record once while in Camp. But was not able to get it to record during the event that I bought it for. So it was a bust. Very disappointed as I wanted to get some footage.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg628

customer_reviews.title: Not convinced it was actually refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I got the GoPro Hero3+ (refurbished) and it was a mistake. The battery was too swollen to fit into the camera. Amazon offered me partial refund to buy a new battery so I did. After recording something and trying to upload to the computer, the camera turns itself off every few seconds so it can't even upload. Seems like it was returned before, but I am not convinced it was actually refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Password protected from previous owner. corrupted firmware incompatible with my pc
customer_reviews.text: Can't use the gopro app because its password protected. can't connect it to my computer to reset it because the software or firmware is corrupted. you sold me a bricked piece of garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for scuba diving!
customer_reviews.text: I love shooting photography, but didn't want to lug around my big DSLR + lenses on our honeymoon in St. Lucia. Opted for the GoPro on our hikes around the island, hanging out at the resort and scuba diving. We did over 15 dives greater than 60' with no issues (I only recommend getting a red filter cover for better color). Check out the video I compiled on my YouTube channel :
customer_reviews.author: UCCincy08

customer_reviews.title: Works great! My company purchased this for making timelapse videos ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My company purchased this for making timelapse videos of installations on office furniture projects, and it works very well. Setup is simple, the case surrounding the camera is very rugged and makes me feel ok with leaving it in a work environment where it could get knocked into or dropped. The picture quality is great, especially in low lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: Scott BlackTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: the camera can pick up the audio pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera for many different activities: attached to my drone for aerial shots, on my car for autocross, underwater shots (in the proper cases), and on my chest for go karting. I am constantly impressed with the quality of the video and sound no matter how shaky or overexposed the image gets. The audio is also top notch and even in the waterproof case, the camera can pick up the audio pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome action camera!
customer_reviews.text: So many different options for ways to mount the camera and things to use it for! I have mostly used mine for fishing/hunting and the occasional video of my kids and it makes for some really great first person shots to relive all the action. love how wide of an angle and high frame rate it has makes for great slow motion videos and never misses any of the actions outside of the shot. The only downside is that the battery doesn't last very long..an hour to hour and a half.. especially if used with the app. Still well worth the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: wschroader

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first GoPro. The included waterproof case works well. Quality looks great when outdoors during the day, but otherwise don't bother. That's expected though, no surprise there. One thing I learned ... you can switch the angle of view for video mode (wide, medium, narrow) ... but you can't in photo mode, the only option is wide.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Smothers

customer_reviews.title: works great for a helmet cam or a dash cam
customer_reviews.text: works great for a helmet cam or a dash cam. GoPro owns the action Camera arena for a reason. super easy to use. I done have a problem with the usb port i can charge it but and cant get the videos or pictures off of it that way
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Not just for action sports enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Based on the suggestions of a few other parents, we bought this to record various moments with our new baby. At first I was a little dubious, but after getting used to it and buying a few accessories (chest mount in particular) I love this thing. The fisheye lens let's you get close to the action without distorting things too much, the build quality is excellent, and the resulting 1080p video is pretty sweet. Now if I can only learn to edit all this video in a decent manner...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great value, best price on the internet!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, best price on the internet! The 3+ Silver is a great camera and good enough to keep beginner's busy and seasoned users happy enough to stay satisfied. Advanced or hobby/pro users may long for the Superview and 4K offered by the more expensive GoPros but I couldn't justify the price jump as a new user. This one will keep me happy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: 512KJT

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the GoPro hero to the hero 3+. It was a very nice upgrade. Having the wifi makes so much difference when being able to have instant access to your videos and pictures to your phone or computer. I also love that it pairs with my Apple Watch so I didn't have to spend an extra $80 on a remote. The quantity of the pictures is great. We took it out kayaking and the colors were so vivid and clear. It's a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: K. Massi

customer_reviews.title: Junk don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Replaced it and it doesn't work either. The serial numbers have been removed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware
customer_reviews.text: Camera looked good. Functioned properly. HOWEVER... The ssid and WiFi password were NOT reset! With this you cannot connect to the gopro app. The camera I received has been set to Twinklecam with a password I can't even begin to guess. At this point I have 6 wasted hours trying to reset this.
customer_reviews.author: Greagoir Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with a battery?
customer_reviews.text: The unfortunate thing is that I can't provide a proper review, as it didn't come with a battery. I was wondering why it wasn't powering on for the longest time, only to look inside and find there was no power source. What sort of camera doesn't include the battery? Came with everything else and is in excellent condition. Sad I have to go out of my way to purchase a rechargeable battery separately before I can even use the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little camera
customer_reviews.text: Having fun with this camera, it's so versatile. So far I've mounted it in my jeep and on my bicycle and it's worked like a champ. One oddity I noticed when viewing the video after transferring it off the camera via the iPhone app. Because I mounted the camera upside down I set the settings to compensate, which they did bit then the video was mirrored in the horizontal axis.... Very odd. I'm not sure if it's user error or a bug in the software/app yet. The wireless control with the app is my favorite function, but beware of wifi interference.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Amos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have admired the GoPro cameras for a long time, and finally decided to make a move. I chose the Hero 3+ Silver, and it seems to be a good choice. These cameras have a complex set of capabilities, but they are set up to be very easy to use and the menus are logical and easy to follow. I wish the field-of-view could be adjusted, but the free GoPro Studio editing software offers the option to reduce "fish-eye" effect or barrel distortion. Some menu settings can help minimize that and experimentation will tell if I can get the results I want to achieve. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: I have had so much fun with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun with this product. I have been scuba diving in Jamaica with it and have recorded tons of my sons ball games with it. In my opinion this is better than the Black edition. The Black comes with a few more pieces but the free App for my iPhone allows me to turn it on and off and view what the camera sees for about 150 feet and I can save pics straight to the phone for posting. The inventor of this product truly deserves to be a millionaire!
customer_reviews.author: Ray H

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product....
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these for our children's families for Christmas. My son had used a GoPro previously and loved what can be done with them. My daughter's family had never used one, but they went to Montana skiing during the holidays and thoroughly enjoyed getting acquainted with it during that trip. It's quite amazing...but the comment I always seem to hear is how great the pictures are. It is incredible how crisp and stable the results are regardless of the duress put on the camera. We're extremely pleased with how much enjoyment the GoPro gift have brought our kids and grandkids. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The wifi connection didn't work as previous owners passcode was o. It so can't use that and quality of footage is very poor as the oi eps are all distorted in a lot of frames. Turing on and off the camera was a hassle as it would turn off and on on its own accord therefore draining no the battery so when I actually wanted it on it would have very little battery left . Overall very disappointed and not worth the noney.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Track Riding...
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for capturing action. I bought this to chronicle my track days. I initially used a Replay but found the sound to be lacking so I now use that as my rear view camera. The GoPro Hero Silver is great. I love the sound quality and the functionality of using my cell phone or tablet to ensure im getting the correct angles. I recommend buying another battery for backup.
customer_reviews.author: LasandSta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from a 10 day section hike of the AT and this was my only camera on that trip and looking back it was the only camera I needed. The size and weight can't be beat and the video quality is second to none. What I was most Impressed by was the the still shots that it took, even through the case the 10mp pictures looked very clear and sharp. for the price I think this is all the camera I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who is an avid fisherman. He was always stating how he wished he could capture his fishing moments. He really likes this gift and has wished he had it other times, like to record crazy drivers an accident on the road LOL. We have had this for quite a while and he still uses it constantly and for multiple things
customer_reviews.author: Buysalot

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with these genuine refurb Hero3+ cameras sold by SupremeDealsCR
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with these genuine refurb Hero3+ cameras sold by SupremeDealsCR. Fast shipping and they have all the accessories included.
customer_reviews.author: rpmakrues

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pro's It's heavy duty Dust proof Water proof Longer battery life in cold than my other cameras Has a mount available for everything I want to do with it Cons Horrible audio without sacrificing water/dust proof, or spending a lot of money. I spent too much money on accessories and the wife has me in the dog house!
customer_reviews.author: Bill & Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great fathers day gift
customer_reviews.text: My Dad always complained of how bad drivers are especially on the 91 freeway in California. So I got him this really nice camera not only can he take high quality pictures and video of bad drivers and potential accidents. He can also use in on fishing trips, rocket launches and other types of indoor and outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Allen

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this is my 2nd GoPro Hero camera (i also own a Hero3 Black Edition). this camera is great with the wifi feature i have it synced to the remote control that came with my Hero3 Black Edition. Now i can mount these cameras and with the click of the remote button, can start/stop both cameras recording at the same time. since i already own a Hero3 the interface is pretty much identical, so there was no problem getting started using it.
customer_reviews.author: FAAR

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. We used it to snorkel
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son and for the family vacation. It worked great. We used it to snorkel, swimming, deep sea fishing and more. The GoPro is easy to set up and use. Next step is we will use it for sporting events.
customer_reviews.author: Duke H.

customer_reviews.title: Okay Camera with Poor Ergonomics and Poor App
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the reputation of being durable and taking good quality images. The controls are not ergonomic. Seems like it should be less expensive for the lack of optimization. The app on android is not very functional or reliable - best to move data via USB cable and not run risk of the wifi app crapping out. Wifi bandwidth and large files means slow data transfer.
customer_reviews.author: NotMarkTwain

customer_reviews.title: This thing can survive almost anything!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought to be used for high altitude ballooning for college students. Found tons of other STEM applications and projects to attach this rug little bad boy on to. This thing survive 2 months in the winter of Ohio strapped to a lost balloon payload.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlon L.

customer_reviews.title: image and video are excelent as expected
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality, image and video are excelent as expected. You have to get used to the fisheye effect, if you don't like it (I do like) you can remove it configuring the camera properly. The app for your phone is a must, way easier to control. It's not (overall) very easy to configure it from scratch, but once you have ir ready, just a few clicks and you are shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Uriel Rozenbaum

customer_reviews.title: GoPro for starters
customer_reviews.text: I got the GoPro Silver Edition because I was on a budget and couldn't afford a hundred dollars more for the black edition, and also because it was my first GoPro so I just wanted to check some of the capabilites. It is excellent for everything it is advertised to. Timelapse is a great feature and will add some cool footage to your video. The only con of the Silver Version is that it doesn't have the 24 fps option. But because I use it as a second camera, i have no problem with that. Other than that, perfect in every way! Great for action and water, and just for a small camera on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Guadamud

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with access issues!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very versatile camera, and I would have posted 5 stars, except that it is very difficult to get the clear case open, requiring a key or coin to release the top latch. Also very difficult to dismount it from the foot mounts. In one way, this is a good thing, as it means that the camera will be sealed safely in adverse weather conditions, and it will stay put where you want it in rough motion conditions, but for quick battery/card changes or to move it quickly to another mount/location/direction... well, good luck! Maybe this will improve with use; I hope so. In the meantime, keep a coin with your GoPro equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This GoPro works great. Very clean and have had no issues. I have been using it for over a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Best Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves it. He wants to do more outdoor activities so he can use the camera. The first video we took was of the dog tugging on his chew toy. One of the coolest features of this camera is the remote operating that you can do via your Android device or tablet. You can even get apps for it on the Apple store if you have an Apple device. The video editing software that GoPro provides you with works really well. It is a fun and tough little camera.
customer_reviews.author: KillerCroc

customer_reviews.title: do not buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: don’t buy use gopro i bought and in 1 month stop working, i even buy warranty asurion for 3 years and nothing nobody answers my email or text or call, don’t spend money for this use garbage stuff,
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Go-pro go!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for a father's day gift and it's already been hiking, to an amusement park, to a water park and the pool. It's awesome. The only thing I suggest is get an accessory kit with it, you can get a good kit for about 20-25 bucks and they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Basschick217

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product 100%
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product 100%...recommend it for everybody who looking for 100% clear view and video. If your trying to record a football game you cant see much from the sideline because it a far away. this is just from a coaches perspective of course. Works well during practice and showing the kids what they are doing wrong. all within 15 to 20 feet is awesome. up close and personal. GET IT !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I took this on my first Spartan Sprint and it really held up well. I had the extended battery pack so with both batteries on 2nd best video settings was able to record about 4 hours and 10 minutes, more than enough to capture my entire race. It comes with some free video editing software which works well. Image quality on the video is very nice. I highly recommend this device. I wore it using a chest harness.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4 starts because I have upgraded since then to to 4 silver. The 3 is a great camera, don't get me wrong. If I hadn't upgraded to the 4 I would be giving this camera 5 starts. The reason why I live the 4 better is because of the built in LCD touch screen and the low light performance. I wish that gopro wouldn't have had changed the batteries but, what can you do. Overall is camera is a good purchase, especially since the price has gone down. If I were to buy a second gopro I wouldn't hesitate to buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera I use it for scuba diving. Takes great video and you can take it anywhere. Connects to my mask so I just turn it on and forget about it, whatever I look at it records. This is a great gift for someone that is into action sports and likes to share their experience with other people.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: We have taken plenty of videos and cool photos with it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He loves it. We have taken plenty of videos and cool photos with it, and every time I am amazed by how good they turn out. We took a video of a Christmas light show and one with the camera under the ice on his parents' pond. It is amazing what can be done with this camera. The video quality and wide angle makes you feel like you are really there when you watch the recordings. There are a ton of awesome accessories you can buy to be used with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cooksey

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases I've ever made. I've taken this thing on countless vacations and have enjoyed reviewing the footage. I bought this as a bundle pack and got a whole bunch of goodies for a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Not Factory Refurbished
customer_reviews.text: The camera is not Factory Refurbished. It came wrapped in foil. The battery it came with is generic, not original GoPro battery. I updated wifi and firmware and it acted up. Once I took the battery out it seamed to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Petar R.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the kid in you!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, and he loves it! Have mounted it to various helmets (skiing, motorcycle, bicycle) as well as attached it to a long pole to film outdoor concerts. What fun! Just having a bit of a tough time trying to figure out how to implement some of the filming modes (like one frame per second).
customer_reviews.author: S. Demo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! The fact that you don't see what ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! The fact that you don't see what you are filming is a little bit awkward, but you get used to it (you can use the app, which is pretty good!). 5 stars for this camera! I took with me in my skii trip, and the filming were amazing! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: JOAO DE CASTRO

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work but got the Hero5 and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this, but the return process was just fine with Amazon. Was not charging correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good camera but I wish I knew it did not stabilize the image while jogging.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Does not pick up sound more than 15 feet away which may be a good or bad thing
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a fisherman and he loves his GoPro. He uses it at least once or twice a week. Does not pick up sound more than 15 feet away which may be a good or bad thing. Can't hear fishing buddies on the same boat when he is in the back and they are up front. Going to take the camera on a hiking and kayaking trip.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for husband- super fun camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for husband- super fun camera. We have been able to make some great videos that a regular camera just won't do. The waterproof case works, recommend buying the accessory kit and SD memory card when you buy your camera so you'll have everything you need from the start! We even made a family home movie by having our 5 year old wear the camera!
customer_reviews.author: M Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for adventures
customer_reviews.text: Great for adventures. The minus of the product is you cannot see what you are filming. Id recommend if able to get the next series up.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Ember

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! I've been doing extensive research for months ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I've been doing extensive research for months trying to find a camera with great quality that was within' my budget and all signs kept pointing to the GoPro. I am completely satisfied with my purchase. I wish I had more to say but there are plenty of reviewers out there already that can give better insight to specs and details than I can.
customer_reviews.author: Monocle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product so far
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product so far. I recently tried one of those cheaper action cam knock offs and it broke twice in the first 5 minutes of taking it out of the package. This a noticeable difference in quality right away and not that much of a price difference. Quality quality quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shmenyon

customer_reviews.title: the camera has been great. the only downside is the batterie tha does ...
customer_reviews.text: the camera has been great. the only downside is the batterie tha does not last much. but it came with 2 batteries and a charger, so te option is i can change the batterie and charge the other one with a portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my multi sports inclined 10 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my multi sports inclined 10 yr old Grandson for Christmas, he was over the moon! I have to order the accessories to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I have a generation 1 GoPro and wasn't very happy with it's battery life but loved the photos I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a generation 1 GoPro and wasn't very happy with it's battery life but loved the photos I could get. This camera is so much more advanced! I like that I can use many of the clamps and other attachments from the previous GoPros, though the lexan case will not fit.I have not played with the WiFi enough to really appreciate it, but it sure has a cool factor to be able to have a remote viewing screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McFarland

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Did not charge. Red led did not light. Swapped batteries. How was this not caught?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hackerott

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, cheaper than the newer version
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, cheaper than the newer version, but works just as good. Most people don't need 4k or 120+ fps.
customer_reviews.author: Zach ASMR

customer_reviews.title: GO PRO HERO 3+ SILVER
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for what I wanted. Ultimate adventure camera. Make sure you research SD cards. some will work fine but at low settings. others with higher read write speeds will work better at max settigns.
customer_reviews.author: BILLY BOB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my 3DR IRIS+ and it works perfectly. Still getting to know some of it's features but for the most part there's no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: WBJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's snorkeling trip. Sadly, last year's Olympus purchase was a bust so we had returned it and were very skeptical of what to purchase for underwater activities on this year's vacation. The GoPro worked wonderfully. We were thrilled with the pix and video we were able to take-this one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: deb roth

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use my gopro when I go to do snorkelling or scuba, very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Portes

customer_reviews.title: GoPro is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's compact and can take up to 4 hours of video with a 64 gig micro disk. The setup screen is tiny, but once you get the hang of it, it works fine. I set it up though an app on my smart phone so it points where I want when in the GoPro jaws clamp mount on my kayak. Takes great video and stills. Since it has wifi, I can stream video to my commuter or tv or download to my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin Bob

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The camera stopped working after seven months. Because it is a discontinued product, GoPro cannot replace it. Amazon will not do anything either because it is past the return date, even though it is still under warranty. Feeling very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Schragenheim

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this item to film my duck hunts as me and my buddy like to make videos covering the span of our season. I couldn't find anywhere on the internet that could beat this smoking deal! This little gadget is awesom! I even got it in time to take it on my family vacations an got to film swimming with dolphins. The quality is absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic videos and still images.
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is just as great as advertised, and I was truly surprised by the quality of the still images. A really great value and no need for pricier models unless film is a true passion or profession.
customer_reviews.author: James Mccartney

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend last year and he simply loves it. We are a pretty active couple. We took this camera to Hawaii, Chile, Peru and Brazil, more to come. It's experienced the elements below water and surface hot/ cold and still takes amazing pictures and video of what we do. It makes it look super legit!
customer_reviews.author: Anais Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I love how small it is and the different modes it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to get used to the buttons but this lil guy does the trick. I've been perfecting my sunset timelapse. I love how small it is and the different modes it offers. If I were using the GoPro for professional videos, I'd probably get the Hero 4, but this was more in my price point. Get this + 32GB MicroSD Card + the Chesty and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: EnDub

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: COOL. Great for spot and go video shooting, but not a great substitute to an actual camcorder. My friends use it in their planes, on their snowmobiles, on their bikes, in their cars and there's a Pebble app/remote for it as well. I like its compact shape and easy to use interface.
customer_reviews.author: TINKERBELL2K

customer_reviews.title: Takes great video
customer_reviews.text: I bought the silver 3+ cause I could not see the need for all the extra video capability that the black does! but I must say if you want a remote control then it is worth buying the 3+ black for an extra 100.00 since the remote will cost you 79.00 but beware if you don't need to have the wifi on your battery will last longer
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great but beware the learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I highly would recommend the LCD backpack though or bump up to the integrated screen. It would have been extremely helpful in framing scenes as there is no way to tell if your settings are optimal for the situation. Poor film quality in low light, however beautiful pictures and video when done right.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren01235

customer_reviews.title: For videos, it's a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'd have liked a new GoPro with better photo quality, but it's not. The photos I took above water are fine as long as you have good light conditions. In poor light conditions, not awesome. Underwater, the photos are really bad, regardless of the light conditions. BUT, when you talk about videos, just AWESOME, even underwater with poor light conditions. For video making, GREAT camera! For underwater photo, better choose something else with a huge casing.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Careful about who you buy this from if you want your manufacturer warranty to be honored.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this GoPro camera in December as a christmas present. it worked well for 6 months. Then, the display screen stopped working. I contacted the manufacturer and learned that, because The Factory Depot is not an approved seller, they will not honor the one year warranty. I contacted The Factory Depot and they will not accept a return after 30 days. This is highly disappointing all around.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this it is my second one and price is right.
customer_reviews.text: I got the battery pack so I get enough battery for my flights
customer_reviews.author: Flyinsky

customer_reviews.title: ... the go pro hero 3 plus yesterday and I love it. This one is ten times better then ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the go pro hero 3 plus yesterday and I love it. This one is ten times better then my go pro hero Plus. I got the battery bundle and it came with 2 batteries that can be changed. I definitely recommend getting this camera 👍☺️👏📹
customer_reviews.author: EJ Ford

customer_reviews.title: Best GoPro for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Chin mounted on my motorcycle helmet, I’ve never had any waterproofing issues, or technical issues in the year I’ve had it. No shakey videos, and supposedly, this one has the longest battery life of any GoPro, which is why I use it with my motorcycle. Just enable one-button mode, push it, and off you go.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bell

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for husband
customer_reviews.text: Got this for birthday gift for my husband. He was shocked that I actually bought it for him and was really happy. He had a little bit of trouble getting the app on his iphone to sync with the camera at first, but after a while of troubleshooting he was able to get everything connected. He is very happy with the quality of the videos and images. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: AlyciaC

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality, little bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like the GoPro SIlver, I only ever use 720p 30fps recording as that is the best balance of battery life + quality for me, and I get 3 hours worth of video in that setting which is enough for most sporting events. Lots of good addons too, but its alittle expensive compared to the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Tong Zou

customer_reviews.title: ... time I did was very impressed video came out excellent, I don't know about the pictures as i ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a GoPro and the first time I did was very impressed video came out excellent, I don't know about the pictures as i have another for that, very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Its okay to buy from Prime used
customer_reviews.text: Camera came in good working order with the clear waterproof casing, no damages to the camera, dont hesitate to buy used from Amazon as you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Damp

customer_reviews.title: happy buyer.
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son's birthday. arrived on time, as described. happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Clifford

customer_reviews.title: GoPro
customer_reviews.text: We adore our GoPro HERO3+ We've recorded some awesome memories so far. The pictures aren't too bad either. It took a little bit of getting used to because you can't really see what you are videoing/photographing, but as long as you have enough footage/photos, you always end up getting something good. It's super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Honi

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I got the Camera and i thought it worked fine but then just a little after having it for a month it stopped working (I know I didnt damage it) It just randomly shuts off on me, I do make sure that the battery is charged etc
customer_reviews.author: Denise B Velten

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for any occasion.
customer_reviews.text: I used mine to do video blogs on my motorcycle. Always had a crystal clear picture even in the rain and dust.
customer_reviews.author: Mekenna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! No issues after almost a year of use! Used in a variety of temps, from freezing to 100°F +. The GoPro Capture works amazing with this camera. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is thrilled with his Go-Pro!! We got it for a recent trip to New Zealand. He attached it the car & took video's of the lovely NZ landscapes. He continues to use it just about every day & is now learning how to edit & compile is video's into cool shows.
customer_reviews.author: MarketingMom

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Review Feedback
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for a Christmas present for a second time for a special person he is very pleased with the results he gets of the videos he takes with the GoPro Hero3 Silver. Awesome action videos at any angle! With lots of accessory options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera worked perfect they only thing I can complain about is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked perfect they only thing I can complain about is the fact that it only comes with the waterproof case it didnt have the open frame to support the mic port so I had to order the open frame....used it 3 days latter with mic and still perfect purchased attachments also way cheaper the buying at bestbuy or Walmart....anyway great camera works awesome
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: He tested out the camera at home and the video looks great. The app for the iphone works very well
customer_reviews.text: Bought the GoPro Hero 3+ Silver edition for my boyfriend who is going on a white water rafting trip. He tested out the camera at home and the video looks great. The app for the iphone works very well. The camera is light weight but the casing feels very secure. He can't wait to use it on his trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, nothing noticeably wrong, and it came with more stuff then I was expecting. Only gripe is in comparison to the new battery I bought the other one doesn't hold a charge as well, but that's to be expected buying a used device
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Bombproof, as long as the wifi is not on
customer_reviews.text: Run without the wifi on and you'll have a blast. Keep the wifi on, ehhh...
customer_reviews.author: pablocasal

customer_reviews.title: this little piece of genius is a perfect accessory for action shots on the go
customer_reviews.text: this little piece of genius is a perfect accessory for action shots on the go. I have been able to capture some videos of things I never thought I would get to do before. Not only have I enjoyed it so far, but my kids have as well. Here's to many more adventures with this brilliant camera.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint is the fact that every time I change ...
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the fact that every time I change the battery you need to re set time and date, etc. Other than that, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: gardelix

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever.
customer_reviews.text: One may want to sit in a good chair and read all the manuals prior to going out and taking video or shooting photos. The camera is fairly easy to use but you need to what buttons do what. The photos are great, the video is clear. If you shoot video alone I would recommend getting the bac pac so you can see what you are shooting. Excellent product which should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Old Musik Luver

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a sponsored athlete!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to capture footage of my hobbies. I've taken mine biking, bodyboarding, hiking, boating, snorkeling, free diving, cliff jumping, and just about everywhere I go on the daily basis. It is the perfect camera for a person like myself. I love the quality of photos and videos. Not much else to say, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sharing adventures
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who is enjoying making videos.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Robertson

product_meta.title: GoPro HERO3+: Silver Edition
product_meta.description:
Style:Camera OnlyBattery pack is in the bottom part of box along with the cord and other parts.

SET CONTAINS:


 *  GoPro HERO3+ Silver Edition Camera
 * Standard Housing for HERO3 / HERO3+ / HERO4 
 * Higher Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery
 * Quick Release Buckle
 * Vertical Quick Release Buckle
 * Curved Adhesive Mount
 * Flat Adhesive Mount
 * 3-Way Pivot Arm
 * USB Charging Cable
 * 1-Year Limited Warranty
feature_bullets: 15 Percent smaller and lighter housing (waterproof to 131 feet /40 meter)
2x faster image processor enables 1080p60 and 720p120 fps video

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,851 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
